result.title: Dijktra's algorithm
result.content: Hello,i learned Dijkstra's algorithm for finding ShortestPath to all vertices.I learned adjacency Matrix version from this source.I have a little doubt that how to find shortest path when we have our vertices not a single number but a pair of two numbers,more specifically say a coordinate(x,y).How to modify our original dijkstra's to solve this.This question needs above modification
